spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are highly accurate. Minor deductions for the missing door lead to Bedroom-3 and slight scaling variance in the Kitchen-Utility partition.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model successfully removes the roof and features no text or measurements. Note: The door to Bedroom-3 is missing (E1), and the entrance lobby area is slightly oversimplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: Consistent clean block-style furniture. Bed colors and sofa orientations match the plan well. Kitchen counter layout (L-shape) is interpreted correctly. Minor beds in Bed-1 and Bed-2 are rotated/placed differently relative to the closets.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly, flat shading, zero photorealistic textures, and a correct isometric orthographic projection on a neutral dark background.

detected_errors.description: Missing interior door connecting the Lobby/Living area to Bedroom-3.
Minor layout distortion in the utility room entrance compared to the narrow plan specification.
